pages.text: The $(thing)Danse Macabre$() is a dark necromantic Ceremony, which will bring $(emph)Zombies$() back to life from $(emph)Rotten Flesh$(). However, there is a decent chance that the summoned creations will be $(emph)Zombie Villagers$() instead. Depending on the environment, other kinds of monsters will spawn instead of Zombies.
